testimonials.name: Regina Sánchez - Cuenca Marcos
testimonials.comment: I had the opportunity to collaborate with Pablo at Endesa and, although we were in different teams, I greatly valued his project leadership and result-oriented approach. He demonstrated solid business knowledge, skill in designing solutions to meet challenges in DyP, and effective team management. His professionalism, commitment, and client orientation make him an excellent worker.

testimonials.name: Carlos Martínez Moreno
testimonials.comment: I worked with Pablo in the Demand & Prices area at Endesa. Pablo was fundamental in all improvements in the area and database maintenance. He also expanded knowledge forming a key duo between programming and electricity & gas market analysis.

testimonials.name: Pablo Diego Maristany
testimonials.position: Strategy & Business Development | M&A | Energy Engineer UPM
testimonials.comment: Working with Pablo was always very positive. He stood out for availability, speed, agility, and notable problem-solving skills impacting the whole team. Beyond his professional qualities, his personal interaction built a solid and trusting working relationship.

testimonials.name: Ángel García Beltrán
testimonials.position: Student at 42 Madrid | Multiplatform Developer | Front-End
testimonials.comment: Working with Pablo at Endesa was a great and enriching experience. He is very technical and always willing to share knowledge, helping integration and clarifying doubts. Excellent professional, committed and a reference to follow.

testimonials.name: María Fernanda Castro Loaiza
testimonials.comment: Working with Pablo is wonderful. After more than a year collaborating with him, I can say he is exceptional both professionally and personally. Proactive, constructive, willing to help and solve problems. Brings value technically and cross-collaboratively, sharing knowledge and raising team skills. Trustworthy and adaptable for challenges.

testimonials.name: Eduardo Inarejos de la Dueña
testimonials.comment: Pablo is a highly methodical professional. On projects, you are confident things will succeed because of his diligence.

testimonials.name: Ángel Quintana Quintana
testimonials.comment: I had the opportunity to meet Pablo at university. He dedicates time to what he likes with achievable goals. Notably committed, e.g., developing a video game from scratch in his free time.

testimonials.name: Emma Serrano Moreno
testimonials.comment: From the beginning of the Master, Pablo has been a great teammate. Always a key support, providing solutions and listening to others. Exemplary team member.

testimonials.name: Ana María Baracaldo
testimonials.position: Operations Technician, Generation Dispatch Control | Energy Industry
testimonials.comment: Exemplary student. Took initiative in group tasks, organized the team, completed all tasks efficiently, and created a great work environment.

testimonials.name: Pablo A. López Martín
testimonials.position: AI Growth & Product Analyst | Data-Driven Customer Acquisition & Monetization
testimonials.comment: We joined Monentia S.L together for internship work. Pablo is dedicated, decisive, and demonstrates impeccable programming skills. Any future teammate is guaranteed professionalism and a great work environment.

testimonials.name: Pedro Domingo Gonzalez Rodriguez
testimonials.comment: Since knowing each other at school, we worked on different projects. Pablo is serious, analytical, and his approach is highly valuable.

testimonials.name: William González Casadiego
testimonials.comment: Very good teammate, responsible, organized, always willing to help. Excellent colleague, wishing him success in his career.

testimonials.name: Regina Sánchez - Cuenca Marcos
testimonials.comment: Tuve la oportunidad de colaborar con Pablo en Endesa y, aunque pertenecíamos a diferentes equipos, siempre valoré enormemente su capacidad para liderar proyectos y su enfoque orientado a resultados. Demostró un sólido conocimiento del negocio, habilidad para diseñar soluciones, y gestión de equipos eficaz. Su profesionalidad y compromiso lo convierten en un gran trabajador.

testimonials.name: Carlos Martínez Moreno
testimonials.position: Analista del mercado eléctrico y de gas
testimonials.comment: Trabajé con Pablo en el área de Demanda y Precios en Endesa y fue un pilar fundamental en el desarrollo de mejoras y mantenimiento de las BBDD. También amplió conocimientos formando un dúo fundamental entre programación y análisis de mercados.

testimonials.name: Pablo Diego Maristany
testimonials.position: Strategy & Business Development | M&A | Energy Engineer UPM
testimonials.comment: Trabajar con Pablo fue siempre muy positivo. Destacó por su disponibilidad, rapidez y agilidad, así como por su notable capacidad para resolver problemas que impactaban al equipo. Su trato personal permitió construir una relación de confianza.

testimonials.name: Ángel García Beltrán
testimonials.position: Estudiante en 42 Madrid | Desarrollador Multiplataforma | Front-End
testimonials.comment: Trabajar con Pablo en Endesa fue una gran experiencia. Es muy técnico, siempre dispuesto a compartir conocimientos y facilitar integración. Profesional excelente y comprometido.

testimonials.name: María Fernanda Castro Loaiza
testimonials.comment: Trabajar con Pablo es maravilloso. Persona excepcional a nivel profesional y personal, proactiva, constructiva, dispuesta a ayudar y aportar valor, confiable y adaptable a retos exigentes.

testimonials.name: Eduardo Inarejos de la Dueña
testimonials.comment: Pablo es un gran profesional muy metódico. En los proyectos, sabes que todo saldrá adelante gracias a él.

testimonials.name: Ángel Quintana Quintana
testimonials.comment: Conocí a Pablo en la universidad, persona comprometida, dedica tiempo a lo que le gusta y se marca objetivos alcanzables. Ejemplo desarrollando un videojuego desde cero.

testimonials.name: Emma Serrano Moreno
testimonials.comment: Desde el principio del Máster, Pablo ha sido un gran compañero. Pilar de ayuda, aporta soluciones y escucha al equipo. Compañero ejemplar.

testimonials.name: Ana María Baracaldo
testimonials.position: Técnico Operador en Despacho de Control de Generación | Energy Industry
testimonials.comment: Estudiante ejemplar. Tomaba iniciativa, organizaba al equipo y realizaba todas las tareas eficientemente, creando un excelente ambiente de trabajo.

testimonials.name: Pablo A. López Martín
testimonials.position: AI Growth & Product Analyst | Data-Driven Customer Acquisition & Monetization
testimonials.comment: Ingresamos juntos en Monentia S.L para prácticas curriculares. Profesional dedicado, decisivo, desempeño impecable en programación. Garantiza seriedad y profesionalidad.

testimonials.name: Pedro Domingo Gonzalez Rodriguez
testimonials.comment: Desde la ESO trabajamos en diferentes proyectos. Pablo es serio, analítico y su forma de ver las cosas es muy valiosa.

testimonials.name: William González Casadiego
testimonials.comment: Muy buen compañero, responsable, organizado, siempre dispuesto a ayudar. Compañero de 10, deseándole éxito en su carrera profesional.
